DOC.brief_summary: To establish the overall agreement of the MassPLEX Factor II and Factor V Leiden Genotyping Test with bi-directional DNA sequencing for Factor II and Factor V Leiden.
DOC.brief_title: Determination of Performance Characteristics of the MassPLEX Factor II/V Leiden Test
DOC.detailed_description: De-identified banked genomic DNA samples derived from whole blood from subjects with suspected thrombophilia will be collected from one or more clinical sites. Three clinical laboratory sites will analyze the samples with the FII/FVL Test. Bi-directional DNA sequencing will be performed on all samples at an independent core reference laboratory.
DOC.criteria: suspected thrombophilia 18 years of age or older
